title: Understanding Data Cleaning
text: Data cleaning involves preparing raw data for analysis by correcting any errors or inconsistencies present in it.

title: Identifying Non-Technical Tasks
text: Identify activities that are not related to the manipulation or preparation of data within a spreadsheet environment.

title: Tasks Related to Sheets
text: When you think about data cleaning, focus on tasks such as removing blanks or fixing errors in datasets, which are usually done within a data processing tool.

title: Non-Data-Centric Activities
text: Consider whether each option involves activities that can be carried out without any data manipulation, often performed in a physical environment.
